title: San Serif Font?
content:
I am looking for a free font similar to the url “foxatomic.com” at the very bottom-center of this poster. Any help will really be grateful:)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [here.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105215/http:/typophile.com/files/here.jpg) | 36.51 KB |
author: spiffy_katt

comments.content: No time to check, but take a look at [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105215/http:/typophile.com/node/13276).
The foxatomic.com font is the one I am looking for not the movie credits part.

It’s hard to tell at that size. Could be Impact or maybe Helvetica Compressed.

- Lex
Thank you the impact is a close match:)
Common choice for credits on movie posters: [Bee](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105215/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/bee/).
